mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : TASK_SEQ.select */ SELECT ID /* ID bigint(0,0) */ , UNIQUE_KEY /* UNIQUE_KEY char(1) */ FROM TASK_SEQ WHERE UNIQUE_KEY = #{uniqueKey} /* UNIQUE_KEY char(1) */
